Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I started this topic to inform you that my HUGE probe series 'LC series' have come come to an end.

I designed and launched the 44th and the last probe of the series.

it feels like LC is going and I am feeling very bad.

I made some of these in v 1.0.5, v 1.1 and the final probes in 1.2.2

So goodbye LC!

Every ending is a chance for a new beginning. Or a reissue of the old.

Take the chance to breath. Then gather up all the posts and bind them together into one big file in word processor of choice. I've used Paperclip and Speedscript, but geoPublish has been gaining some traction. Do an editorial clean up.  Then post the final product.
